prompts.title: Prompts
prompts.description: Collection of system prompts for artificial intelligence.
prompts.promptDefinition: A system prompt is the base text that is transmitted to an artificial intelligence model before any interaction. It is generally stored in a markdown file (.md) at the root of the project; you can have several depending on needs and scopes.
prompts.promptDefinitionFull:
A system prompt is the base text that is transmitted to an artificial intelligence model before any interaction. It is generally stored in a markdown file (.md) at the root of the project; you can have several depending on needs and scopes.

They act somewhat like the ten commandments that the AI agent will consider when generating its answers and code.

To ensure these rules are properly considered, it's best to specify them at the start of the conversation with the AI.

For example:
«Considering the rules from the rules.prompt.md file, I'd like you to ...»
prompts.whyPromptTitle: Why is a good prompt essential with AI?
prompts.whyPromptBody1: A well-written prompt yields more relevant, precise, and tailored responses. It guides the AI, reduces misunderstandings, and maximizes the value of AI tools.
prompts.whyPromptBody2: Think of the AI as a full-fledged collaborator: if the instruction is vague, it may misinterpret your expectations and provide inappropriate or off-topic responses.
